page.title: 13SUTTON VENY INDUSTRY
page.content: There is a small Industrial Estate on the edge of the village called Pound Barton.There are about eight different places on the estate including a wine merchant,furniture maker,farm supply firm and a repair garage. The industrial estate is very new and people were very worried when it was being built because it might spoil a pretty village.The buildings are all quite low and trees and bushes have been planted all around them. Most of the people who work in the estate live in Sutton Veny or some of the villages which are close.
